body:
Comment 3: 
Since the language doesn't permit comparing function values other than nil, DeepEqual
has to make a choice.  There is no choice that will be correct for all use cases.  I'm
sorry that the current choice doesn't work for you, but changing it will give us
something that won't work for other people.  Since the current DeepEqual code is not
wrong, I can't see a reason to change it.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
